titleInfo.title: Blood sampling does not affect fledging success and fledgling local recruitment in coal tits (Parus ater)

mods.abstract: In order to assess the potentially harmful consequences of blood sampling in nestling coal tits (Parus ater), we analysed fledging success, fledgling local recruitment and recruit natal dispersal for nestlings originating from 27 blood-sampled broods and nestlings from 39 control broods. No adverse effects of blood sampling were detectable.
